amendatorysection.catchline: Production of wind or solar energy; leases; terms, defined.
amendatorysection.para: (1) Board means the Board of Educational Lands and Funds;
(2) Lease means any lease, easement, covenant, or other such contractual arrangement;
(3) Lessee means any individual, corporation, or other entity that enters into a lease with the board;
(4) Solar energy means radiant energy, direct, diffuse, or reflected, received from the sun at wavelengths suitable for conversion into thermal, chemical, or electrical energy; and
(5) Wind energy means the use of wind to produce electricity.
